name: Cosmos Rupture
description:
This is a short platform-2D game about an astronaut doing his mission alongside his AI. Some secrets are not worth your trouble, don't you think?

It has some serious gameplay problems that I am aware but...

It was just for me to learn anyways, so have fun! (If you can)

Controls:

A - Move Left

W - Jump

D - Move Right

Left Mouse Button (LMB) - Shoot

Right Mouse Button (RMB) - Hook
